Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE seguros.vg_acessorio SET COD_SIGLA_ACESS = :COD_SIGLA_ACESS, DES_ACESSORIO = :DES_ACESSORIO, COD_USUARIO = :COD_USUARIO, DTH_TIMESTAMP = CURRENT TIMESTAMP, IND_TP_ACESSORIO = :IND_TP_ACESSORIO, IND_APRES_ADICIONAL = :IND_APRES_ADICIONAL WHERE NUM_ACESSORIO = :NUM_ACESSORIO END SQL
